creditline: Lent by Richard and Diana Rose
description: gray; one-piece unit; stylized, organic shape, tapers towards bottom; push buttons on underside of hand-set; attaches to oval, plastic wall piece with notch that fits into ear piece; black cord attached to bottom of phone; housed in aqua and gray original packaging box
dimension: 10 7/8 x 2 1/4 x 2 in. (27.62 x 5.72 x 5.08 cm) (without cord)
title: Wall phone
